alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:13AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG WIND GUSTS WILL IMPACT WESTERN BIG HORN...EAST CENTRAL CARBON...CENTRAL YELLOWSTONE...EASTERN MUSSELSHELL...NORTHERN ROSEBUD AND TREASURE COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM MDT... At 1211 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong winds from showers and thunderstorms moving east at 35 mph. The leading edge of the strong winds was along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Melstone to near Worden to 10 miles southeast of Laurel. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Hysham, Custer, Melstone, Huntley, Pryor, Worden, Fort Smith, Crow Agency, Ballantine, Pompeys Pillar, Bighorn, Ingomar, St. Xavier, and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
